00001 // ==================================================================
00002 // @(#)radix-tree.h
00003 //
00004 // A library of function that handles radix-trees intended to store
00005 // IPv4 prefixes.
00006 //
00007 // @author Bruno Quoitin (bqu@infonet.fundp.ac.be)
00008 // @date 22/10/2002
00009 // @lastdate 21/05/2003
00010 // ==================================================================
00011 
00012 #ifndef __RADIX_TREE_H__
00013 #define __RADIX_TREE_H__
00014 
00015 #include <types.h>
00016 
00017 // ----- pointer to free function for radix-tree items --------------
00018 typedef void (*FRadixTreeDestroy)(void ** ppItem);
00019 // ----- pointer to list function for radix-tree items --------------
00020 typedef int (*FRadixTreeForEach)(uint32_t uKey, uint8_t uKeyLen,
00021                                  void * pItem, void * pContext);
00022 
00023 // ----- structure of a radix-tree node -----------------------------
00024 typedef struct RadixTreeItem {
00025   struct RadixTreeItem * pLeft;  // 0
00026   struct RadixTreeItem * pRight; // 1
00027   void * pItem;
00028 } SRadixTreeItem;
00029 
00030 // ----- structure of a radix-tree ----------------------------------
00031 typedef struct {
00032   SRadixTreeItem * pRoot;
00033   uint8_t uKeyLen;
00034   FRadixTreeDestroy fDestroy;
00035 } SRadixTree;
00036

00038 extern SRadixTree * radix_tree_create(uint8_t uKeyLen,
00039                                       FRadixTreeDestroy fDestroy);
00040 // ----- radix_tree_destroy -----------------------------------------
00041 extern void radix_tree_destroy(SRadixTree ** ppTree);
00042 // ----- radix_tree_add ---------------------------------------------
00043 extern int radix_tree_add(SRadixTree * pTree, uint32_t uKey,
00044                           uint8_t uKeyLen, void * pItem);
00045 // ----- radix_tree_remove ------------------------------------------
00046 extern int radix_tree_remove(SRadixTree * pTree, uint32_t uKey,
00047                              uint8_t uKeyLen);
00048 // ----- radix_tree_get_exact ---------------------------------------
00049 extern void * radix_tree_get_exact(SRadixTree * pTree,
00050                                    uint32_t uKey,
00051                                    uint8_t uKeyLen);
00052 // ----- radix_tree_get_best ----------------------------------------
00053 extern void * radix_tree_get_best(SRadixTree * pTree,
00054                                   uint32_t uKey,
00055                                   uint8_t uKeyLen);

00059                                void * pContext);
